sentence.Network_en: No one ordered him back whence he came.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有人命令过他从哪里来回哪里去。

sentence.Network_en: They returned whence they had come.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们从哪里来又回到哪里去了。

sentence.Network_en: All are good lasses, but whence come the bad wives?
sentence.Network_cn: 姑娘个个好, 泼妇何处来?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以 -ence... ... thence 从此, 从那时起 whence 从该处,来处,根源,(从)何处,从哪里,拒此 ambience (周围)环境,气氛.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... thrice 三次 whence 从何处，由此 normalcy 正常状态.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(W) ... when the sea gives up its dead 在耶稣复活的时候 whence 来处 whencesoever 无论从什么地方.
wheelwork 转动装置whence 根源；从何处；为什么；由此whereabouts 下落

list.abs: Since all the maids are good and lovable from whence come the evil wives ?, 既然娘儿们都美好而可爱 , 雌老虎又从何而来?
Do I truly know whence I came or whither am bound ?, 我真的知道自己从哪里来 , 到哪里去吗?
whence came this family ideal of life ., 这种生活的家族理想是哪里来的呢.
All are good lasses , but whence come the bad wives ?, 少女个个好 , 恶妻何处来?
Monsieur saint john , whence come you圣约翰先生，您从什么地方来

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English whennes, from earlier whenne (from Old English hwanon, of Germanic origin) + -s (later respelled -ce to denote the unvoiced sound)

example.ex: No one ordered him back whence he came.
example.tran: 没有人命令过他从哪里来回哪里去。

means.word_mean: 1. from what place or origin or source;

sentences.sentence: "sketches the lawless society whence the ballads sprang"-DeLancey Ferguson

auth_sentence.content: Crooks, from whence used to dangle...legs of...mutton.
auth_sentence.res_content: Crooks, from whence used to dangle...legs of...mutton.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Crooks, from whence used to dangle...legs of...mutton.

auth_sentence.content: I did not know whence came my breath.
auth_sentence.res_content: I did not know whence came my breath.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I did not know whence came my breath.

auth_sentence.content: Is he both able and willing? Then whence cometh evil?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is he both able and willing? Then whence cometh evil?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is he both able and willing? Then whence cometh evil?
